description: Enterprise techniques used by OLDBAIT, ATT&CK software S0138 v1.0
name: OLDBAIT (S0138)

techniques.comment: OLDBAIT collects credentials from Internet Explorer, Mozilla Firefox, Eudora, and several email clients.
OLDBAIT installs itself in %ALLUSERPROFILE%\Application Data\Microsoft\MediaPlayer\updatewindws.exe; the directory name is missing a space and the file name is missing the letter "o."
OLDBAIT obfuscates internal strings and unpacks them at startup.
OLDBAIT can use HTTP or SMTP for C2.
